Address.Address1: 12-14 NGUYEN QUANG BICH STR., HOAN KIEM DIST 12-14

Description.Text: Located in a historic and charming street of Old Quarter Hanoi, the hotel is a convenient place where guests can just step out and feel the true life of the over-1000-year-old beautiful city and its culture, distinguished by the historic sites, the true elegance of the old colonial buildings and the mish-mash of narrow streets in the Old Quarter. The heart of Vietnam, the Hoan Kiem Lake, together with the stories of the magic turtle and the legend King Ly Thai To who founded the city, is just a few blocks away. Guests can visit the famous Thang Long Water Puppet Theatre to watch an interesting show. Hanoi Airport is approximately 5 km from the hotel.

The air-conditioned city hotel, built in 2011, features over 40 rooms of various categories suitable for different accommodation needs. Guests are welcomed in the lobby, which offers 24-hour reception and 24-hour check-out service as well as a hotel safe, currency exchange facilities and lift access to upper floors. The exquisite hotel has a well-equipped business/leisure lounge, a cafÃ© and restaurant and many more convenient facilities. The staff and management are all professional and dedicate 24 hours a day to ensure guests have pleasant stays, as well as to assist them with all travel related services throughout Vietnam and overseas. Further amenities include wireless Internet access as well as room and laundry services.
